permissions: Admins can create follows for any user. Non-admins can create follows only when they are the follower.
side_effects: Creates a follow record linking the follower to the creator.
validation_notes: --follower is required. --creator cannot be combined with --creator-type or --creator-id. If --creator is used it must be in the format type|id. If --creator is not used, --creator-type and --creator-id are required. Creator must be in scope for the follower. Creator type must be a valid post creator type. Follower and creator must be unique for a follow.

flags.name: --creator
flags.validation: Format: type|id (e.g., projects|123). Cannot be combined with --creator-type or --creator-id.
